Package org.ogema.driver.homematic.device

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ogema.driver.homematic.device.Device
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CO2Detector, MotionDetector, Remote, SmokeSensor, SwitchPlug, Thermostat, ThreeStateSensor, THSensor
    public abstract class Device
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a remote endpoint in a Homematic network.
